import {useState} from "react"; export const Form = () => { const [form, setForm] = useState ({ recipeName:"", summary:"", healthScore:"", steps:"", image:"", diet:"", }) const [errors, serErrors] = useState ({ recipeName:"", summary:"", healthScore:"", steps:"", image:"", diet:"", }) const validate = (form) => { } const changeHandler = (event) =>{ //me trae informacion de donde estoy disparando el evento. Que input disparo el evento. const property = event.target.name const value = event.target.value setForm({...form, [property] : value}) } const submitHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); console.log(form) alert("apretado el boton") } return (
) } export default Form
